nodes.text: Anrick was a freighter captain who was a good friend of the con artist Mikos Argdran. During the Galactic Civil War, Anrick transported the Rebel Alliance operative Shondra Del to the planet Merisee in the Elrood sector while she was on the run from the Imperial Security Bureau. Shortly afterward, Argdran and a group of Rebel agents journeyed to Merisee in search of Del. On arrival on the world, Argdran commed Anrick to ask for information regarding her whereabouts, and Anrick told him that Del had headed into Caronath, the world's capital city.
